title: Optimal Conditions for Key Digestive Enzymes

content.prompt: Based on Figure 1, which of the following best describes where each enzyme functions?

choices.label: Pepsin works in the intestines because the optimal pH for pepsin is basic.
Trypsin works in the stomach because the optimal pH for trypsin is basic.
Pepsin works in the stomach because the optimal pH for pepsin is acidic.
Trypsin works in the stomach because the optimal pH for trypsin is acidic.

skill.text: 4.B: Describe data from a table or graph, including: i. identifying specific data points ii. describing trends and patterns in the data iii. describing relationships between variables
